name: Light (itch) (givagofritzen)
description:
Light is a game where you controll a light spark with the objective to reach the lamppost in the mountain while facing decisions in the path.

This game was done at GGJ18. This is an updated version. Containing a game executable and project.

The link original: https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/light-0

Credits: 

Fernanda Batista - Artist

Givago Fritzen - Programming

Nícolas Hoffmann - Programming
